value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Now, Alm, fight your best for me, and
I promise to free you from the
contract.$k$pJust one more battle. That's all I'm
asking.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|All right, Princess Veronica. Then
we'll give it our all.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|What? You broke the contract for
good—just by proving that you're
stronger than us?$k$pThank you. Now we can return to
our fight to free Zofia from our
own invaders.$k$pIf you ever cross paths with us
again, or with my friend Celica,
I hope you will join us.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I go through all this trouble to get
a few new Heroes, and you take
them from me again!$k$pWhy, why, why?!$k$pWhat's the use? It's pointless.
I just can't... I can't...$k$pI...$k$pI want you all to d—$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Enough, Veronica! Return to the
castle at once.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Oh! Must I? All right.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|You again!$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I will give you one last warning.
Get in our way, and I will be
forced to kill you.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|We will not back down, no matter
how vicious the threat.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Ergggh...$k$pAskr...royals...death...death...
Death to my enemy...$k$pY-you foolish people!$k$pLeave us alone, or I swear that
you will not survive our next
encounter!$k$p$Sbs150|
